titles.title: Condemning Cuba and the Chinese Communist Party for discussing and implementing an agreement to build a Chinese Communist Party spy base on the island of Cuba, 90 miles from the United States.
Condemning Cuba and the Chinese Communist Party for discussing and implementing an agreement to build a Chinese Communist Party spy base on the island of Cuba, 90 miles from the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution condemns Cuba and China for discussing and implementing an agreement to build a Chinese intelligence base on the island of Cuba, 90 miles from the United States.
